level.heading: Attorney's fees.
level.text: With respect to a consumer credit sale or direct installment loan the agreement may provide for the payment by the consumer of reasonable attorney's fees not in excess of 15% of the unpaid balance of the obligation.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-255
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-255, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 28-3802.
